message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this deal and we both walk away with something.
Alice, my turn. I believe in fairness, this offer benefits us both.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's settle this. My last offer was already generous, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Take it or leave it.
Alice, time is running out. This is my final offer. Let's end this on a fair note.
